mean_en: one of two or more forms of a chemical element which have the same number of protons but a different number of neutrons in their atoms. They have different physical properties (= characteristics) but the same chemical ones
sentence: U-238 is a radioactive isotope of uranium.
sentence_trans: U-238是铀的一种放射性同位素。
word_etyma: iso等，同 + tope位置 → 同位素
